text: "Cold" is a single by Dutch three-piece girl group O'G3NE. The song was released in the Netherlands as a digital download on 13 March 2015 by 8ball TV. The song peaked at number 70 on the Dutch Singles Chart. ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- !
